channel.title: Door bugs

item.title: Door bugs
item.dc:creator: @tor0en tor0en
item.description:
@tor0en wrote:

hey i was wondering if some one knew how to fix all doors with one simple code or something. i got this code now:

					if ((objectX == 3217 && objectY == 3218) || (objectX == 3217 && objectY == 3219) || (objectX == 3213 && objectY == 3222) || (objectX == 3213 && objectY == 3221)) {
						face = -3; //South
						face2 = -1; //North
					}//else = West (standard)
					if (objectID == 1516) {
						//Place the new gate
						ReplaceObject((objectX - 1), objectY, (objectID + 1), face);
						ReplaceObject((objectX - 1), (objectY + 1), (objectID + 4), face2);
						//Remove the original gate
						ReplaceObject(objectX, (objectY + 1), -1, -1);
						ReplaceObject(objectX, objectY, -1, -1);
					} else if (objectID == 1519) {
						//Place the new gate
						ReplaceObject((objectX - 1), (objectY - 0), (objectID - 2), face);
						ReplaceObject((objectX - 1), objectY, (objectID + 1), face2);
						//Remove the original gate
						ReplaceObject(objectX, objectY, -1, -1);
						ReplaceObject(objectX, (objectY - 1), -1, -1);
					} else if (objectID == 1517) {
						//Place the new gate
						ReplaceObject((objectX + 1), (objectY + 1), (objectID + 2), face);
						ReplaceObject((objectX + 1), objectY, (objectID - 1), face);
						//Remove the original gate
						ReplaceObject(objectX, (objectY + 1), -1, -1);
						ReplaceObject(objectX, objectY, -1, -1);
					} else if (objectID == 1520) {
						//Place the new gate
						ReplaceObject((objectX + 1), objectY, (objectID - 1), face);
						ReplaceObject((objectX + 1), (objectY - 1), (objectID - 4), face);
						//Remove the original gate
						ReplaceObject(objectX, objectY, -1, -1);
						ReplaceObject(objectX, (objectY - 1), -1, -1);
					}
break;

of hte new code i was thinking of, is it posible to add something like:

if the large door(1519) is facing north (-1), and if u click it the door will be replaced to x,y and face 2, and that is if the door is facing -1. so if the door is facing 2 it will face 3 and so onâ€¦ so i only set the diffrent things to each door so it wont be a problems with doors any more

Read full topic
